risks.title: Apache mod_status is enabled and accessible
risks.description: Why this is bad: An attacker can gain very valuable information from this internal status page including IP addresses, co-hosted services and user activity.
risks.fix: To fix, disable mod_status or serve it on a different port than the configured hidden service.

risks.title: Small number of images with EXIF metadata were discovered!
risks.description: Why this is bad: EXIF metadata can itself deanonymize a user or service operator (e.g. GPS location, Name etc.). Or, when combined, can be used to link anonymous identities together.
risks.fix: To fix, re-encode all images to strip EXIF and other metadata.
